Html:
It will be great if you could release the mdf in SQL 2005 compliant version.

I understand that the tutorial is meant for VS 2010 , but I am using Vs 2008 and have SQL 2005.
Yes, this makes sense. Someone else had asked that I just include SQL scripts, would that be sufficient?
That would be great to have SQL Scripts.

I've uploaded SQL Scripts: http://mvcmusicstore.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/9299484ae233#MvcMusicStore-Create.sql

Let me know if you have problems with them - I scripted with SQL 2005 compatibility.

Errors occured when I excuted the script in MvcMusicStore-Create.sql on SQL Express 2005. I need some help because i use sql server 2005.
